item.description: Skills Technical Database: Mysql (advanced) PostgreSql (entry-level) Sqlite (entry-level) MongoDB (entry-level) Language: Go (entry-level) PHP (advanced) / JS/TS (intermediate) Framework: BE: Gin-gonic (entry-level) Laravel (intermediate) Magento (intermediate) FE: Reactjs (intermediate) Nextjs (entry-level) Infrastructure: Nginx (intermediate) Docker (intermediate) AWS (entry-level) Gitlab CI/CD (entry-level) Other devtools: Git (intermediate) IDE (intermediate) Chrome Devtools (intermediate) Non-Technical English: intermediate, verbal & non-verbal Experience Full-stack Developer Company: Fintech Company Duration: 2024 - present Full-stack Developer Company: Intersoft Duration: 2023 - 2024 (layoff) Full-stack Developer Company: Manifera - Experienced, Reliable Software Development Teams Duration: 2021 - 2023 Magento Backend Developer Company: SmartOSC Duration: 2019 - 2021 Education - Certifications Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology Electronics-Telecommunications Engineering 2014 - 2019 TOEIC 750 IIG Vietnam 2019

Professional Projects Fintech System (May 2024 - present) Description: Build a system, show in in-app webview, indicate products (including affiliate links). Technologies: Gin-gonic (Golang), Reactjs, MongoDB, Docker Team size: 3 members (1 developer) Responsibilities: Research & suggest technical solution. Manage git & server deployment. Fintech System (maintenance) (Mar 2024 - present) Description: Maintain a system to show, compare loans, credit cards best offer on Vietnamese market. Tracking affiliate link clicks & sync data to BigQuery, which allow Data Analysist to work with.
